Up — package mechaml

Module Mechaml.Agent.HttpResponse

The HttpResponse module defines a type and operations to extract content and metadata from server response

type t
val status : t ‑> http_status_code
val status_code : t ‑> int
val headers : t ‑> http_headers
val content : t ‑> string
val page : t ‑> Page.t
val location : t ‑> Uri.t
val cohttp_response : t ‑> Cohttp.Response.t
